I was still able to move freely and dance and still do my catering job as well. Seems fairly well made to. If you like it more loose go up a size but not really necessary.

This is a beautiful lace dress. I have issues with the white buttons so I took them off sewed up the seem.  The lace around the front makes me too big in the bust. I went for xx thinking I can take it in if it is a bit baggy. So glad I got the xx. Doesn't gap in breast or over stretch with the elastic band. I'm thinking of ordering another as it very comfortable. Semi dressy and I love the mix of laces and dotted swiss fabric.

This dress fit perfectly. I am 5'4", 170lbs, the dress hit at ankle. I used as a wedding dress for a casual backyard wedding. A very beautiful, romantic dress, great for a wedding or an outdoor event.

This dress fit perfectly and was so flattering! The quality is fantastic - such a great deal! The cut and stretchyness of it was perfect! Love this dress!

I really love this dress! I ordered the pink one in small. The lace is very detailed and it feels really nice wearing it. I gave birth not too long ago and this dress fits perfect. The sleeves are my favorite part as the hang loosely down my shoulders and falls at the crease of my elbow. It feels very elegant.

This dress is beautiful. I love the lace details and buttons. Disappointed because there was a tear in the dress upon receiving.

I purchased the dress for my granddaughter. The dress is perfect for my family’s beach photos. It is flowy and good quality. It is thin and see through so my granddaughter will wear a slip or a type of under garment. She is very happy with it. The price is good & fit perfectly.,

I bought this dress as a last minute change for what to wear at my daughter’s 70’s themed wedding, and I am SOOOO happy I did! It was 1,000xs more comfy than the plain dress I was planning on wearing. This dress was breathable and so flattering.

Love the different textures of fabric in this dress. I really don't like white, but needed it for a program.  It was about 4" too long, but very easy to hem between the 3rd and 4th tiers without loosing the pretty scalloped lace around the bottom. (5'4") Lot of compliments. Thinking of dying it to a color that I would wear more.

It is a very beautiful dress. Very flattering and well made. Unfortunately no pockets. However, the lace and details are beautiful. The purple wasn't that dull to me like others have stated. It wasn't as bright purple as advertised but it was still a beautiful color purple. I loved it! I am 5'2 and around 168 with a 38D bust for reference. I purchased the Large I believe. I wore 1 1/2" sandals so if you want it more flirt length I would wear flats.

I bought a size XXL to make sure the dress woould appear loose and full. I usually wear a 14; the dress fits like a 14-16. The top fits perfectly and is not too large as I expected it might be. The midriff is elasticized and therefore a flexible fit, and the skirt is full. The lining is adequate and not see-through. The length of a size XXL is almost floor-length on me (5'8"), so just right with low heels. The light blue color is not a powder- or baby-blue, it's a soft blue-gray and I love it!
I loved this dress. Ultimately returned it as I was looking at a few different ones for a wedding. This was a little too casual. It’s flattering to the waist line and the bench is not too deep.
I will be wearing this dress to my son’s wedding.  It’s very comfortable and looks great on.  It can be dressed up with shoes and jewelry or more casual with sandals.

Fits as expected! Beautiful detail. Perfect for a beach vacation.  Fabric was a bit stiffer than I expected and a little poofier than the picture looks.  Hopefully with a few washes it will relax the fabric some

Quality of sewn seams was bad.  I had to cut off bottom ruffle to make it a midi.  I'm 4'11 it drug the floor with heels.  The seams didn't match up.  The front panels weren't uniform.  Wore it anyway to a cruise dinner.
Ok, so I wanted this to be amazing but it wasn’t. Runs very small, feels so cheap, looks cheap. Its just a fail all the way around.

评论概述: Not great if you have a bigger chest
评论详情: I adore this dress for its overall style and fit, but sadly, it falls short in the chest area. Despite ordering a larger size, the rubber band around the buttons isn't sturdy enough, creating gaps. This proved to be very disappointing, especially since I intended to use it for my Halloween vampire costume and potentially for Renaissance fairs. It's a shame because everything else about the dress, from its design to its comfort, is wonderful. If the chest area were better designed, it would be a perfect addition to any wardrobe.
Bello

The attention to detail on this dress is mind blowingly fantastic! A beautiful combination of touches of lace, embroidery and fabric. Very feminine, flattering and comfortable to wear. The lining covers everything very well, this is a modest, classic dress style. The fit is perfect, I imagine it would work beautifully for a vast array of body types. You simply must see the gorgeous detail of this dress in person!!! I may have to go snag the green one as well!
I got this to wear to the Era Movie , got a lot of compliments on it.. I made me feel very chic& also it was giving folklore.. this is totally worth the money & it fits amazing..

I absolutely love the style and appearance of this dress for photo shoots. I actually have the exact same one in another color! The fit is true to size but the bodice doesn’t stretch much especially in the shoulders, so if you’re between sizes, go up. The lighter colors has some airy sheerness, but the black one is not see thru at all. The quality of the lace on the dress is really nice, it doesn’t get all pilled.  I’d definitely recommend this dress, it’s great for special occasions and photo shoots
This dress is great quality, it fits well and every time I wear it, I get many compliments.
Very very pretty

评论概述: Color not as advertised, fabric itchy
评论详情: This blue lace dress is just not for me after wearing it a bit. I got this dress in sky blue in size medium (I am 5'7", size 8-10, 155 lb), and it does fit true to size. If you are larger in the bust, this may not fit you well, but I was able to fit into it with a 36C bra size. I did like that the waistline was not particularly constricting. On the minus side, though, I don't think the sky blue color was quite what I expected from the product photos. The promotional photos made it look like a more dusty, muted, midtone blue, while the actual dress I received was a pastel powder blue. It just wasn't what I hoped for, and not a color that works particularly well for me. The lace of the dress is also on the stiff and itchy side. The frills are cute, but also more than what I personally like. Overall - if you like the color and styling of this dress - maybe it is worth it for you. It just wasn't what I was expecting from the promotional images.
Super comfortable and flattering! I’m 5’7” and 168lbs and I got a medium!

This dress is beautiful, fits very well but quite long. I ordered in black because of it's versatility. The lace is beautiful and the dress is well-made. It's suitable for a formal event, an evening date or church, anything that you want to dress up for.

The purple color is so dull and muted in person. It makes the dress look frumpy and matronly. It also washes me out. I can’t stand how pale this purple is compared to the vibrant lavender in the listing images (clearly photoshopped). And part of the reason that the purple is so dull, is because they used gray lace throughout the dress. It just looks awful. I don’t recommend this particular color for this dress. Wish I had got it in black. As far as the fit goes, it is true to size. I’m 5’6”, 150#, 34D, and normally a size small in dresses for reference. I ordered this dress in a size small and it fits great. Very comfortable and breathable.
